InitBlock.name: CD_FCST_LINK_TYPE_ITEM

DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: select VAL from VALUEOF(TBO).S_LST_OF_VAL where LANG_ID = 'VALUEOF(OLTP_LANG_ID)' and TYPE = 'FCST_FCSTITEM_LINK_TYPE' and NAME = 'Item'

InitBlock.InitString: select VAL from VALUEOF(TBO).S_LST_OF_VAL where LANG_ID = 'VALUEOF(OLTP_LANG_ID)' and TYPE = 'FCST_FCSTITEM_LINK_TYPE' and NAME = 'Item'
